item.title: SWN
item.description: score:140 Chances: Southwestern Energy’s stock has shown resilience in the face of broader macroeconomic trends, with high institutional ownership indicating sensitivity to market movements. Higher oil production and reduction in marketing purchases have positively impacted Southwestern Energy’s Q4 earnings. The longer-term bull case for natural gas, including expanding U.
